EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Executive Breakfast_OR_Q413.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal for an exclusive executive breakfast on Sept 18
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Register now for an informative session with Pivotal Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We hope you can join us <http://play.gopivotal.com/NorthAm_ExecBreakfast_OR_Register.html> for an executive breakfast event on Sept 18th at the Hotel Lucia, Portland OR. Whether itâ€™s termed modernization or innovation, there are changes that demand a shift from traditional architectures in order to deliver new consumer experiences and value with existing resources and lower costs.
If you need help delivering applications while decreasing time to production, then we can help. Pivotal provides our platform-as-a-service to help you build, deploy and run your apps at an unprecedented pace. Explore <http://play.gopivotal.com/NorthAm_ExecBreakfast_OR_Register.html> how you can become more productive with your existing resources through automation and agile development techniques. The agenda will offer a live demonstration and thought provoking conversation on:
- The changing market - PaaS market landscape - Unique benefits - Background on Cloud Foundry - Architecture and product road map
Regsiter>><http://play.gopivotal.com/NorthAm_ExecBreakfast_OR_Register.html> We hope to see you there.
Best,
Chris Wiggins and Julian Mardirosian
Questions? Contact Chris <mailto:cwiggins@gopivotal.com> or Julian <mailto:jmardirosian@gopivotal.com>. Stay current on all things Pivotal. Visit our Blog>> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> Read Pivotal's latest news. Visit our Resources page>> <http://www.gopivotal.com/resources>
